channel.title: math.CV updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.CV updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Koebe uniformization of nondegenerate domains with bounded gap-ratio
item.description: arXiv:2408.03484v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Koebe uniformization is a fundemental problem in complex analysis. In this paper, we use transboundary extremal length to show that every nondegenerate and uncountably connected domain with bounded gap-ratio is conformally homeomorphic to a circle domain.
item.dc:creator: Yi Zhong

item.title: Holomorphic foliations tangent to Rolle-pfaffian hypersurfaces
item.description: arXiv:2408.03914v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In this paper we study germs of holomorphic foliations, at the origin of the complex plane, tangent to Pfaffian hypersurfaces - integral hypersurfaces of real analytic 1-forms - satisfying the Rolle-Khovanskii condition. This hypothesis leads us to conclude that such a foliation is defined by a closed meromorphic 1-form, also allowing the classification of the simple models in its reduction of singularities.
item.dc:creator: Arturo Fern\'andez-P\'erez, Rog\'erio Mol, Rudy Rosas

item.title: Random dynamical systems of polynomial automorphisms on $\Bbb{C}^{2}$
item.description: arXiv:2408.03577v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: This paper deals with random dynamical systems of polynomial automorphisms (complex generalized H\'{e}non maps and their conjugate maps) of $\Bbb{C}^{2}.$ We show that a generic random dynamical system of polynomial automorphisms has ``mean stablity'' on $\Bbb{C}^{2}$. Further, we show that if a system has mean stability, then (1) for each $z\in \Bbb{C}^{2}$ and for almost every sequence $\gamma =(\gamma _{n})_{n=1}^{\infty }$ of maps, the Lyapunov exponents of $\gamma $ at $z$ are negative, (2) there are only finitely many minimal sets of the system, (3) each minimal set is attracting, and (4) for each $z\in \Bbb{C}^{2}$ and for almost every sequence $\gamma $ of maps, the orbit $\{ \gamma _{n}\cdots \gamma _{1}(z) \} _{n=1}^{\infty }$ tends to one of the minimal sets of the system. Note that (1)--(4) cannot hold for any deterministic iteration dynamical system of a single complex generalized H\'{e}non map. We observe many new phenomena in random dynamical systems of polynomial automorphisms of $\Bbb{C}^{2}$ and observe the mechanisms. We provide new strategies and methods to study higher-dimensional random holomorphic dynamical systems.
item.dc:creator: Hiroki Sumi
